ModMetaData.name: Misc. Robots Xtension
ModMetaData.author: Haplo
ModMetaData.description:
*** This needs Miscellaneous CORE to work without errors! *** *** This also needs Misc. Robots to work without errors! ***
-GardenerBot (working template) This robot is a working template for you to add your own robots. Unmodified this is a robot that cuts down plants
1. Replace GardenerBot with whatever you want it to be 2. Change the workTypeDef and workTag number in the AIRobot_Races.xml 3. Replace the graphics with your graphic set
(Version: 0.13.2)
